column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=But they 're not like that anymore , are they ?
#Text=I do n't know .
#Text=I mean , now it seems like a lot of places have taken on that model .
#Text=You have all this stuff out there , something hits , and then everything goes behind that .
#Text=On Christopher Hitchens , Orwell and 9/11 as inspiration
#Text=Why did you decide to take on Orwell ?
#Text=I went to school at P.S. 41 .
#Text=I read Orwell over and over again and of course as a kid , I liked it .
#Text=But I did n't really understand what about it that also depressed me .
#Text=It 's kind of a bludgeon for revolutionary thinking .
#Text=On a number of levels , Orwell encourages you to think that you 're not as smart as the pigs -- that revolution is doomed to failure .
#Text=I do n't know if that 's exactly what Orwell meant , but that 's certainly how it 's framed in school .
#Text=How it reads in general ?
#Text=Really how it 's used .
#Text=It 's the paradigm of the Cold War and it was used to promote the Cold War .
#Text=In fact , the phrase " Cold War " is Orwell 's term .
#Text=He was very aware of what was happening with this .
#Text=I do n't know if he would have liked that it ended up being a real tool for the CIA to push the Cold War agenda --
#Text=I do n't think he would have liked it .
#Text=But that 's what happened , and at the end of his life he was involved with some pretty conservative people .
#Text=Whether or not it was entirely his own doing or he was a weak , lovelorn old man is another question .
#Text=I think probably some of both .
#Text=Christopher Hitchens called you an " Osama bin Ladenist . ”
#Text=It gave them stature that they may not have had before .
#Text=Is it the same ?
#Text=Yeah , I mean it 's just also completely so absurd .
#Text=We got all this press for Snowball 's Chance , and of course it was all based on whether people were conservative or progressive .
#Text=They either liked me based on their politics or did n't like me based on their politics .
#Text=Hitchens did n't read the book .
#Text=In fact , that 's the only thing that makes me a little bit bitter , that he called me a " bin Ladenist " without having read the book .
#Text=But yeah , I do n't mind .
#Text=It 's just so completely absurd .
